Posts.Content: Hi ,had my first chemo today,got myself into a bit of a state,didn't need to,the nurse stayed with me for the 1 1/2 hours it took,there were 10 of us having treatment,some took longer than me. It is now 6 hours after and I'm fully awake can't sleep.had a couple of hours of palpataions,but that might be because I had a cup of tea and I'm only used to decaf. Hoping the next 3 weeks go quickly with not too many side affects.it is terrifying of the unknown.let me know how you get on Thursday .good luck ,big hugs xxxx
Posts.Title: Outrageous!

Posts.Content: Thank you for replying,if someone had told me that just having breast cancer and it not have spread was good news I would have thought they were mad.but it is good news I am so glad I have joined this group .please don't forget me x
Posts.Title: Mars den hospital Sutton

Posts.Content: Hi Annie Thank you so much for your reply.at the moment it still feels as if its not happening to me as I feel fine.cant get my head round having to go through this treatment to make me feel really bad ,to make me feel better when I feel fine.once I start the treatment it might feel more real Where does all this strength come from,I am having people around me falling apart and I am still carrying on Maybe it hasn't hit me yet Sadie xxxx
Posts.Title: Mars den hospital Sutton

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply,can't believe people are taking time to be in touch. Feeling not so different to others Good luck with your scans ...keep in touch xxx
Posts.Title: Mars den hospital Sutton

Posts.Content: Just been diagnosed with stage 3 breast and lymph nodes,been to the hospital 3 times this week for bone and ct Scan,both came back clear,starting chemo on 3 July for 20 weeks then surgery then radiotherapy .really really scared Everyone at the hospital are fantastic
Posts.Title: Mars den hospital Sutton

Posts.Content: Hi terry how nice to hear from you.yes it seems we are going to go through the same thing.thank you for reassuring me that it won't be as bad as people say I am the same as you don't think I can wear a wig,but who knows.i will make an appointment to see Paul I have been going to all the appointments with my daughters so they have been taking in more info than me Good tip about the parking ,will do that It seems such a long time doesn't it a year. Maybe we will meet if we go on the same day Positive pebbles Sadiexxx
Posts.Title: Mars den hospital Sutton

Posts.Content: Is this normal.my first chemo yesterday,thought I might get a good night sleep,but no. I can feel my heart pounding,my eyes are tired but my brain is fully awake.only slept for 2 hours HELP xxx
Posts.Title: Not sleeping
